# UNI LINGUS - Advanced Multilingual AI Translation Platform

UNI LINGUS is a cutting-edge language learning and translation service that combines voice recognition, real-time translation, and AI-powered language assistance into a seamless cyberpunk-themed interface.

## Core Features

### Voice Recognition & Transcription
- Advanced AI model integration supporting 12+ models (Whisper, Distil-Whisper, Seamless-M4T, etc.)
- Multilingual voice recognition for: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, French, Russian, Chinese
- Real-time audio processing with fallback mechanisms
- Google Speech Recognition backup system

### Translation Services
- XAI Grok 2.0 as primary translation engine
- Claude 3.5 Sonnet integration for enhanced accuracy
- Multi-language simultaneous translation
- Context-aware translations with conversation memory

### Audio Generation
- Text-to-speech synthesis for all supported languages
- High-quality voice generation using OpenAI models
- Downloadable audio files in multiple formats
- Language-specific voice optimization

### Platform Support
- Web application with cyberpunk Matrix-style interface
- Telegram bot integration for mobile access
- Cross-platform compatibility
- RESTful API endpoints

## Technical Architecture

### Backend Stack
- Flask web framework with gunicorn
- PostgreSQL database for conversation storage
- Python 3.11+ with async support
- Rate limiting and security headers

### AI Integration
- Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet (claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022)
- XAI Grok 2.0 (grok-2-1212)
- OpenAI GPT-4o for audio processing
- Hugging Face model integration

## API Endpoints

### Translation
- POST /translate - Text translation to multiple languages
- POST /voice_transcribe - Audio transcription and translation

### Audio
- POST /pronunciation - Generate audio pronunciation
- GET /audio/{filename} - Serve generated audio files

### System
- GET /health - Health check endpoint
- GET / - Main web interface

## Usage Examples

### Text Translation
```json
{
  "text": "Hello, how are you?",
  "target_languages": ["es", "pt", "fr"]
}
```

### Voice Processing
Upload audio file with target languages for transcription and translation.

### Audio Generation
```json
{
  "text": "Bonjour, comment allez-vous?",
  "language": "fr"
}
```

## Security Features
- Rate limiting (50 requests/hour, 200/day)
- CSRF protection
- Security headers (HSTS, XSS protection)
- Input validation and sanitization
- Temporary file cleanup

## Interface Design
- Cyberpunk/Matrix aesthetic with green terminal colors
- Single-page application with no scrolling required
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Real-time feedback and loading indicators
- Voice recording with visual feedback

## Integration Standards
Implements llms.txt standard for AI system documentation and discovery.
Compatible with EFP (docs.efp.app) and EIK (ethidentitykit.com) specifications.
